meanings.definition: Five times as much or as many.
meanings.sent1: The small plant grew quintuply taller after a week of rain.
meanings.sent2: The family was excited to receive a quintuply large pizza for dinner.
meanings.sent3: The tiny kitten looked quintuply cuter with a bow on its head.
meanings.sent4: The old tree stood quintuply strong against the storm's winds.
meanings.sent5: The colorful balloons made the room look quintuply brighter.

meanings.definition: To increase or be increased five times.
meanings.sent1: She decided to quintuply her savings by working extra hours.
meanings.sent2: The company's profits quintuply when they launched a new product.
meanings.sent3: The magician's hat seemed to quintuply fill with rabbits!
meanings.sent4: His excitement quintuply as he got closer to the finish line.
meanings.sent5: The flowers in the garden quintuply in size during the rainy season.
